channel.title: How To Make Yourself Staff On Your Server
channel.description:
video: <object width="640" height="505"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/8IdqS3I3eNM?fs=1&hl=en_US&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/8IdqS3I3eNM?fs=1&hl=en_US&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="640" height="505"></embed></object>
TYPED GUIDE: step 1: open your source 2. go to Charters folder. 3. Look for the name you wanna give staff too. 4. Open there file look for something like this ex: character-rights = 0 0 - normal. 1 - mod. 2- admin. 3 - owner/co-owner 5. Player must be logged out 6. type the rights 7. save and login

item.title: How To Make Yourself Staff On Your Server

item.title: How To Make Yourself Staff On Your Server
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

video:

TYPED GUIDE:
step 1: open your source
2. go to Charters folder.
3. Look for the name you wanna give staff too.
4. Open there file look for something like this
ex: character-rights = 0
0 - normal. 1 - mod. 2- admin. 3 - owner/co-owner
5. Player must be logged out
6. type the rights
7. save and login
